name: SearXNG
natural_language_description: 这是 SearXNG 节点。主要用于: Search in SearXNG

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: language (值: None) - Defines the language to use. It's a two-letter language code. (e.g., `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, or `fr` for French). Head to SearXNG search syntax page for more info.
safesearch (值: None) - Filter search results of engines which support safe search
